Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory14.png'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "I still don't think they suit me.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'They look good but I just feel a bit on edge when using this frame.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'You said it looks good!', 3: '8', 4: "You don't feel comfortable?", 5: '9'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Twin tails do not match my style.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "It's just that... How should I phrase it... I'm not used to it...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "I only know how to fight, so I've always focused on weapons and strength... I've never cared about appearances before.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "But ever since you came after I received this frame, I've felt a bit strange.", 4: '1'}
{2: "What's that got to do with me?", 3: '13', 4: 'Strange?', 5: '13'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'I started to care about what people thought of me and what kind of impression I left...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "It's all useless for executing missions.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "But I can't stop myself from thinking about it... This feeling, maybe I can only erase it by rebooting...", 4: '1'}
{2: "You're afraid of change?", 3: '18', 4: "I won't allow that.", 5: '19'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "I'm afraid.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'I know, which is why I can only try to make myself forget these feelings.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'If I accepted them, I may become an entirely different Lucia than I am now.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Is it really alright for someone like me to feel like that?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'You are you, Lucia.', 3: '23', 4: "I'll still be by your side no matter what happens.", 5: '24'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "You're always like that...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "You're always like that, Commandant... Always coming up with straightforward and surprising solutions.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'I can now confirm that Commandant is the root of these problems.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'My fault?', 3: '27', 4: '(Apologize first)', 5: '27'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'So, um... The twin tails, do you think they look good, Commandant?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'I love twin tails!', 3: '29', 4: 'You look really good with twin tails!', 5: '29'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "Commandant... It's a bit embarrassing hearing that from you...", 4: '1'}
